resources.string: site:setka.ru (users) "%1$s" "%2$s" ("Recruiter" OR "Talent Acquisition" OR "Talent Manager" OR "Talent Partner" OR "Sourcing" OR "Headhunter" OR "HR Manager" OR "HR Specialist" OR "HR Business Partner" OR "HRBP" OR "People Partner" OR "People Ops" OR "Hiring Manager" OR "Recruitment Consultant" OR "Staffing Specialist" OR "Talent Scout" OR "People Manager" OR "HR Director" OR "HRD" OR "People Operations" OR "Рекрутер" OR "Эйчар" OR "HR-менеджер" OR "Менеджер по подбору персоналу" OR "Кадровик") -site:setka.ru/posts -site:setka.ru/communities
